website_summaries.verdict: A mid-level video lighting kit that delivers a high level of quality in the construction of the lights, as well as in the performance.
pros: Ships with 2 LED lights, 2 light stands, 2 diffusers, and 2 cases
You can adjust the color temperature of the LEDs to between 3200 and 5600 Kelvin
Includes aluminum in frames for durability
cons: Light sizes are a little small, especially for the price
Not as bright as some people would like
Somewhat pricey, but doesn't include barn doors

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights for the price. I have broken these down and set them up multiple times at different locations and they work excellent. Pros- -Set up and take down is a breeze -Able to be powered by battery which makes mobiles shoots a breeze -complete silent and very cool -packs up nicely/ easy to transport Cons- -The tabs that hold the filters in could be designed better. They're very easy to accidentally push in -The power cables should use a 90 degree style plug in to lessen the stress -The power cables are far too short. They don't reach the ground when fully extended -The power cable brick does not fit well in the case
customer_reviews.author: Bike N Bird

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these lights
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile production company my goal is always be as effecient as possible. What I love about these light is the illumination they provide while taking photos and filming is awesome. The major plus is they are battery operated so I don't have to conern myself with using my client electricty or using a bunch of small LED lights when I'm at an outside location.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable light, color, and super lightweight too.
customer_reviews.text: Well-built with a heat-dissipating aluminum casing. Comes with carrying case, decent adjustable stands, and AC adapters. Optional Sony A6000 batteries (2 per light) make these totally portable. I've run these 8 hours a day for about a month straight, no problems. Nice set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT as big as they advertise.(but a decent light still)
customer_reviews.text: It's not the full 10.4 x 10.4 inches shown in the pix on their ad pictures. It's 8.25 x 7.5 inches. The good...the light output is very good. The color range is very good. The construction and materials seem very good. The light stands are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... a YouTuber in a small office and these work great. Figured I wouldn't need the batteries
customer_reviews.text: I'm a YouTuber in a small office and these work great. Figured I wouldn't need the batteries, that I could just plug them in. Buy the batteries! trust me. Extension cords all over the office are not a good look. Love the ability to make the light warmer if I want using the adjustment knob. Love being able to dim them as well. They don't put off a lot of heat, but they do get warm. Videos look great now.
customer_reviews.author: GrimmGreen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my semi professional office
customer_reviews.text: What I love about these is they are super easy to install and don't make my smaller office really hot like other bulbs. I can keep them on for a lengthy period of time without the issues of over heating the office. I use this along with my green screen to create youtube and twitter video content daily. I have 2, one in each corner of my office pointing at me. Easy install, great price and helps make professional quality video.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G Williams

customer_reviews.title: The ability to warm the lights and dim are also great features. In addition
customer_reviews.text: Can't be beat for the price. Used them at a wedding the day after receiving them. Don't know how I would've gotten by without them. 2 can definitely illuminate a medium to small dancefloor or other space. The ability to warm the lights and dim are also great features. In addition, they can be operated by battery power, and come with power cords if you have access to a power source. A simple, but excellent addition to my videography setup. Can't wait to see how they affect the still photography work.
customer_reviews.author: HIGuy

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BRIGHT - amazing white/yellow light/sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that came to mind when turning this on was HOW bright it was! It has two white and yellow light knobs. The knobs itself can adjust brightness as well. You can lower it or make it higher. It’s sturdy, the lights itself are quite small and the stands can go all the way up. It has two power adapter cables so plugging this in is great. (Buy the batteries separately if you’re traveling and need it for the outdoors) I’m a Twitch streamer so using this will be a HUGE lifesaver! Recommended product!!
customer_reviews.author: blinkytracer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fill Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple to setup and operate. Used for fill lighting on livestream productions and created very quality effect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Iaquinta

customer_reviews.title: Great budget lights for the budding creator/filmmaker!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are pretty great for the price! I needed something relatively inexpensive for shooting YouTube videos and these fit the bill. The dual tone lights are great to make sure I'm getting the best color lighting. They're not very big but still produce a ton of light. I'm only lighting a fairly small area, so no issue there. The carrying cases are nicely padded to keep everything safe. The stands that come with the lights are not terribly sturdy but work perfectly well for what I'm using them for. I wouldn't put much more weight than these lights on them, though. All in all these are a great value and do exaclty what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Know your lighting needs and space of use before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I turned the brightness all the way up for the picture. These things get very bright. I record videos to put on YouTube and these are perfect for the space that I use them in. The tripods are very sturdy and they work as described!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights are no longer working
customer_reviews.text: I have had these lights for 1 year now and both are no longer working. I AM ABSOLUTELY NOT SATISFIED WITH THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best lights for the price, quality is definitely there!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lights I've ever purchased. The quality of the build and the functionality is amazing! I look forward to using these and possibly even getting a few more down the line!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Modify

customer_reviews.title: 2 different colored stands was received, good support
customer_reviews.text: Lights work, except I received two different stands. One was metal chrome, the other was black. I worked with Neewer support directly and they compensated me for the shipping issue.
customer_reviews.author: aahnn

customer_reviews.title: Great value and package
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this led lighting kit for my son's movie filming. He used these lights for 2 weeks straight, and really liked the amount of light it put out, and how you can adjust the color tone of the light. The only issue is with the tripod leg locks, they are plastic, and you don't want to over tighten them, because I have read they can break. So we wrap some painters take around the shaft, to prevent the legs from sliding up. Other than that great package.
customer_reviews.author: Brad T.

customer_reviews.title: Great budget option,  but Neewer has better options
customer_reviews.text: Solid, good performing, and cheap light panels with good features. The one downside I'd point to with these lights is the lack of designed ability to mount accessories like barn doors. They're definitely better suited for videography than photography (which is true of all continuous lights). The only reason I won't order these again is that I'll get the step up with barn doors.
customer_reviews.author: elcidbob

customer_reviews.title: Defective power supply
customer_reviews.text: Seven weeks after I purchased these lights, one of the power supplies stopped working. I have contacted the seller to see if they will replace it. I will update my review after I hear from them. Right now, I would say do not buy these lights. They will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Bynum

customer_reviews.title: seems to work fine, extreme difficulty in finding battery model, NO Customer service with these
customer_reviews.text: these seem to work fine, but impossible to find the model number of the lithium batteries that go with it. The lights have on them that 7.2V is needed. Neewer refers to amazon for guidance, which points to a 7.4V battery. they don't even know their own product. They have a customer support number but it is only an answering machine and it's going on 3 months and email customer service has yet to provide an answer. Neewer has dropped the ball. very frustrating. I will not order Neewer products again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kit for a photo enthusiast. You can change the temperature and brightness and having two accomplishes a lot. Pros * Bright * Easy to control * Not too expensive * Has a diffuse panel Cons * The cord should be longer and without a power brick. * The battery situation has limitations on what you can use. To fill these up with camera batteries would be expensive. It should just come with a battery or use some 9v batteries. This limits portability.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Let there be LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, the lights work great. Changing between pure white and more incandescent vibe is a nice touch that keep some photos that need a lot of light from seeming sterile. I keep them in one spot set up but the traveling bags are a nice touch, I wish the power cables were a little longer but that's because of the needs of my dedicated set up. Some kind of weight relief or pack holder for the power supplies and cable when on the stands would be a nice touch as well. Overall VERY satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great value but power supply failed right as warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was bad. I had a light that was failing for months but waited just too long to report the issue. I was a week outside of warranty and they wouldn’t make a failed power supply right. Mercifully a new one was 15 dollars but still... weak sauce. Works well if the power supply hasn’t failed but adjusting angles is a pain as the screw adjusters bind and you have to rotate the panel to unstick them. They’re cheap but do get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights that make it easy to pack up and take anywhere! Honestly one of the best investments I have made on lights so far. The quality is there, and the price point is awesome! Only thing that is a negative is the battery life and charge time (it last anywhere between 3-6 hours depending on how high the settings, but it takes about 6HRS for my charger to fully charge them) That has nothing to do with the lights though, as batteries are sold through 3rd party companies. The charging cable comes in handy when the batteries run out, just don't lose them like I did :)
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use, I love the dimming knobs.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Nice and bright - Separate dimming knobs for the white and yellow LEDs - Quick and easy to set up - Comes with handy carrying cases Cons: - None really Other notes: - The materials are decent, definitely not flimsy or too cheap, but can probably break without much trouble if dropped or mishandled. - The plastic end-piece on the bottom of one of the stands arrived cracked, not sure if this happened during shipping but I felt I should mention it. Overall a better set than a cheaper one I had previously purchased, and much easier to set up and use. Very satisfied with this product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Venues, Weddings, and Any Outdoor/Indoor Situations
customer_reviews.text: These lights are a phenomenal addition to my wife's photography. The biggest help they have been to us is sparkler exits at weddings. We put one light on a tripod for the end of the sparkler line, while I stand next to my wife and point one of the lights at the bride and groom as they walk down the exit. These lights are bright and small! The batteries (not included - but not needed) last roughly 2-3 hours depending on brightness. An absolutely NEED for any photographer for indoor or outdoor pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed: bright, adjustable lights for your everyday lighting needs
customer_reviews.text: These lights are VERY bright, with adjustment knobs for both the white and yellow LEDs. The stands that come with the set are perfect for the purpose, and give my studio a nice, professional appearance. - The light enclosures are made of a nice metal, and have a nice finish - Adjustment knobs move nicely and firmly - There's a switch on the back of each light that toggles battery or AC power (I don't use batteries) - There are two slots for batteries, although I haven't tried them For the price, I'd recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: These add a ton of light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great kit for someone doing band videos (small to medium bands on stage) all the way to doing a one person speaking video. They're small, so when you put them up, you won't expect this much light to emit, but when you crank them up, MAN they have some kick to them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Torres

customer_reviews.title: This light rig is perfect for YouTube video production
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights to help with lighting my Youtube video productions and I couldn't be more happy with my purchase. These lights fall under the budget lighting category because of the cost and some people might translate that as being cheap product. I think these are much more than just budget lighting. They work great for my use case scenario and I would highly recommend these lights if you are in the market for a lighting solution for Youtube video production. If you are curious about the results I am getting with these lights, head to youtube and search for my channel "Project Ramos" my latest videos were shot using these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ramos

customer_reviews.title: work great, a few suggestions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Easy to dial light level and filter level up and down (separate, clearly marked buttons on the back of each light). Remote shutter button works great. Suggestions for future models: Buttons are on the back, which as a solo artist will soon discover, makes it quite frustrating and time consuming to light one's self. Maybe a remote for this as well? or a forward facing panel? Really wish that the stands had a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: quadruplethreat

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lights panel with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable and efficient LED panels, but know their limitations before buying them. The item arrived way ahead of the target date--thanks to prime. The bi-color mode works fine, and stands look sturdy enough for those light panels, which look smaller than I expected (it was described correctly, though). The cord is indeed short, and I have to add an extension cord to move the stands around. Overall, I am happy with the purchase. More importantly, the seller was prompt and courteous enough to give me partial refund when the price went down within a week, which I really appreciated. Fast and courteous customer service.
customer_reviews.author: milans

customer_reviews.title: Wrong lights sent to me, and the quality is terrible
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a year since I bought these, when I received the lights I thought they were slightly different than when I purchased...today I am looking for more lights because...well the ones I got sucked - when I saw that I purchased THESE lights and got the crappy ones I have. I work in video production, and found myself back here. So my point is, I purchased these more expensive lights, got the cheaper ones instead, the cheaper ones suck and I won't consider repurchasing (even though I was considering purchasing these lights a few minutes ago) simply because I was sent a crappy version of this same product. Bad business Newer.
customer_reviews.author: Harlowe

customer_reviews.title: Good lights at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I like these lights. I just wanted something portable and compact. I was not expecting much for the price but they have help up and they have worked well. The only two bad things are these. For some reason they strobe on my green screen so I have to adjust my shutter speed and the cord is too short. They are a little flimsy but not fragile. I am pretty hard on my equipment and they are still holding up but just don't expect them to last a lifetime if you are using them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eyegandhi

customer_reviews.title: Great color temp range and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The stand is good, it is well adjustable and the color can be easily changed from cool to warm. I wish the power cord was longer though. When you raise the stand, the power cord can only travel a very short distance. Unless you have the batteries or are next to an outlet you will almost always need an extension cord. Not a big deal but still not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these lights. The heat and dimmability of the lights are fantastic, the arrangement on the stands are excellent, and I've filmed hundreds of hours and yet to come up againt a scenario I couldn't make these lights work for. And the value for the price is amazing. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Professional look for webinars!
customer_reviews.text: Webinars are becoming a key component of independent contractor marketing and having the right equipment to ensure you present well is critical. I’ve purchased (and gave used several times) a great microphone and camera and the neewer lights were the perfect solution to generating lighting that ensures a more professional look and presentation. They’re very flexible and totally adjustable to ensure only flattering shadowing — love them!
customer_reviews.author: Aqualibrium

customer_reviews.title: Listing made it seem like they would be brighter
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for filming in a small studio to illuminate a desk - they aren't nearly as bright as the listing made them out to be. The overall build quality is fine, just not sure if they're worth even half of what they're asking for them.
customer_reviews.author: IPLAYFORKEEPS

customer_reviews.title: Poor consistency
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights twice the first set (second pic) bought 7 months ago son in law who streams loved them but wanted a third one and daughter wanted one for makeup so I bought another set of 2. Son instantly noticed a flaw in the second pair both have the wrong mounting bracket (first picture) causes the light to be unstable and not properly mount to the stand. If he had to move it at all instead of leaving it still for his green screen we would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Neewer 2 Packs Dimmable Bi-color 480 LED Video...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality lights and stands. I recommend them for anyone needing lights for upping their photography game. 1 light can be sufficient light, but two provides nice spread of the light and avoids shadowy areas. The color temperature control is a nice feature, but I have only used these lights with both white and yellowish LEDs on full power.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L.

customer_reviews.title: Neewer Continues to Amaze Me
customer_reviews.text: Yes, Neewer can be considered "entry-level", but their quality keeps getting better and better. I would have paid double for this lighting kit. Solid construction. Thermonuclear brightness with dimmable knobs for both tungsten and white. :) As you already know, the smaller the light source, the harder the shadows. Pick up a good bounce and diffuser (which Neewer also makes) for some amazing looking interviews.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Light heads are small, but pack a punch in illumination.
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable light kit for interviewing purposes. Upon opening the light cases, I was surprised by the size of the light itself -- a tad smaller than I expected, however once I plugged it in I was satisfied by the brightness of the product. The light temperatures are a plus, dimmers definitely a plus, all in all I'm satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JEMcreative

customer_reviews.title: BEST LIGHTS FOR CREATORS
customer_reviews.text: I use these lights for EVERYTHING! I take them on photo shoots and video shoots. You have the option for battery or plug in. Honestly even for my streams they are great. They don’t take up much space and they just do the job for any setting. I always have at least one with me
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Penor

customer_reviews.title: Power cord too short, get B0842ZBH5H to fix it
customer_reviews.text: Good light but power adapter hangs putting strain on the connector. I'm using two of these crazy long adapters to fix the problem. Search Amazon for this product number B0842ZBH5H. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Aussie57

customer_reviews.title: Really helps balance the light in my painting studio
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these to light my subject and my palette so both are in the same temperature of light. I appreciate their portability and plan to order the batteries soon so I can also take them with me when I'm teaching in places with limited outlet availability.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights
customer_reviews.text: I'm a film student and I ordered these lights as my first pair of lights and they are perfect. They have a wide range for the price and, if you take care of them, I expect them to last for quite a while. They seem steady though I might still use a sandbag on the base and they are lightweight which is great for my back troubles. I really think that, for the price, you can't beat these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Poor light diffuser panels
customer_reviews.text: The included diffusion plates/sheets do a terrible job diffusing the light. You can see each individual LED as clear as day. Everything else about the product was top notch, but it's unusable if you need your light source to be properly diffused.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Portable Enough to bring on the Plane Ride
customer_reviews.text: They work great for streaming. I recommend buying a second pair, though, as I form an inward-facing triangle with three of these, which reduces shadow perfectly. Additionally, I've brought them on a few planes, threw them in checked luggage, and they handled it just fine. They're so portable that they've been with me from as far south as Tampa, to as far north as Chicago haha. And I drag them around town in a luggage bag since I don't have a car.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm an actor, do a lot of self-taping for auditions and this works well for me. The lighting is horrible in my place and love the way you can make adjustments to the brightness and color tones. Had other lighting before - which was cheaply made, but actually cost more than this which didn't work so well at all. Simply love this set up!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Robish

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to damage
customer_reviews.text: There are already a few light bulbs that are not lit, so it’s really angry.
customer_reviews.author: angela baby

customer_reviews.title: great lighting for taking pictures/shooting videos
customer_reviews.text: A professional photographer recommended this lighting to my husband who needed lighting to shoot video auditions. These lights are easy to set up and adjust, and provides the right amount of lighting. An added plus are the padded storage cases that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Harp Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I use them for a photo booth I have and wish I had these sooner! They cut down the clutter so much with the battery operated feature. They add style to my booth and are prettier to look at than lights with umbrellas in. Don't get me wrong, umbrellas could be great but being that I have a very mobile business, umbrellas tend to bend/break after much use. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo De La Pena

customer_reviews.title: best studio lights I've used
customer_reviews.text: I love how streamlined these lights are! easy to pack and move around, lightweight, not bulky, don't get hot and in the way. it has alternating rows of warm/yellow light and bright white light, which are both dimmable from their own dial which is a really great option because you can adjust this to meet your needs as far as your setting and what kind of light you have around you. really cool option you can also get a battery pack with this, which is really cool too, especially if you're a photographer who shoots in the field, the compatibility of these is an even higher sellling point for you as well overall, im happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tatgunjoe

customer_reviews.title: The best LED photo lights for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cowboy lights and they all crap out... some other similar lights and they are cheap and broke. These are bright as hell and small, the stands are great and not ""cheap", the diffusers work well and make the light small and not a huge softbox in the way. I would say these are the best I can find for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: These two led lights meet the keywords I searched for, dimmable, bi-color temperature and including light stand, cuz the price is lower than my budget, so I fixed these. I like to plug them directly into a regular socket, but the official says it supports the use of 2 batteries, adn I did see two grooves. In fact, there is not much need to buy batteries, because no one will really take them to places where there is no socket.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: One of the two lights completely stopped working after just 2 uses. I reached out to Neewer for support but no answer.
customer_reviews.author: Newton dad

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Not happy got these for an important photo shoot tested them prior to leaving and they lit up, at the photo shoot they shut off by themselves and wouldn't turn back on. The socket for the power line is loose and is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Great for studio lighting
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality. Just getting started in videos and photography and these are a great investment. I have the battery packs to make them portable when I'm outside shooting. Just haven't taken them out to see how long the quality is
customer_reviews.author: MarvelFan

customer_reviews.title: Great to take pics and make YouTube videos!
customer_reviews.text: I use them to make videos for YouTube and take some pictures and they work great. Very light and portable. I like the fact that you can add batteries to go wireless. You can also add accessories.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been really happy with these lights!! The consistency and quality of the lighting is amazing for the price!! We needed detailed pictures for before and after pictures and these lights have been amazing. So happy we purchased these!
customer_reviews.author: Megifog

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to film drum covers in my dark basement. They are super bright. I love that you can blend the colors together. The bags are a nice touch too. If you're looking for an inexpensive lighting option, these are your answer!
customer_reviews.author: Gage Pine

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the individual light carrying cases. Easy to assemble. Great temperature control love the portability and ease of moving around the room. Stands are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bouses

customer_reviews.title: I love the bicolor too
customer_reviews.text: these lights are bright. I love the bicolor too. works amazing. it would be nice to be able to get a defuser for it, I think the defuser is a film (with words on it) that is attached to the clear plastic cover, nothing on it that says don't remove or identifying it as what it is. but, still great product
customer_reviews.author: HohO

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile setup in height, in lighting adjustments, and angling. Having the light and stand bag is a nice addition. We purchased without the optional additional batteries as we would only be using lights in environments with outlet power, but it is nice to know that was an option:
customer_reviews.author: cargeek

customer_reviews.title: Great light set.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are just great plane and simple. The build is solid and they should last for a very long time.. my only complaint is that one had already been opened and repacked. It works fine and was not damaged in any way so I am ok with it. I would recommend them to any one.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are everything for me! The quality of my comedy videos improved greatly. They are awesome! Just what I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA  RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I've used the lights now for about 3 hrs of total on time. They are very bright. My only complaint would be you have to bring the lights a closer than an equivalent CFL softbox. They light seems to bit less focused, the optional barn doors may fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Threeonesix

customer_reviews.title: they work great!
customer_reviews.text: I love how portable and light weight these lights are. They arrived with a carrying case which makes them so easy to take it with me on location shoots with all my other gear. The lights perform just as well as my heavier lights and the build quality is amazing. I was really surprised at how much light this put out for as compact as the product is. I used them recently during an outdoor shoot and they worked studio magic. I have used them as back lights, hair lights, and as a fills, they're so versatile with the dual colored white and yellow inlayed leds ! I would recommend them entirely for both video and photography.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lipchik

customer_reviews.title: BEST value and quality to self tape auditions
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lighting for taping. I spent hundreds before on other lighting and I have two sets of these now self taping auditions
customer_reviews.author: Elise Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You are always wondering if you will be part of the one star gang, but thank goodness I'm part of the 5. Everything came in great state, can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon SDA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a wedding that I shot and they were amazing. Used it mostly off the adapter and the batteries lasted me for hours. The cordless option makes it so much easier to be able to move them around and the U bracket allowed me to rotate it and get my lighting just right. Worked well indoors and outdoors. Stands sturdy even with people running into it and my clients seem thrilled with their photos. Will continue to use these lights for future bookings.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Why spend more? These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: This kit produces more light than I needed - it's nice that the color temperature is adjustable. The stands are sturdy, the lights feel well made. Carrier is included too. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: dave m

customer_reviews.title: Good lights for video
customer_reviews.text: Very good lights! I use them for video production and they work great. The temperature control is good and easy to understand. It has a yellow nob and a white nob, to increase/decrease the light of each color. Portable, and easy to pack up quickly! Light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase as far as filming equipment for lighting. Absolutely amazing! Easy to set up. You can plug it in or buy chargeable batteries. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laketta Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable setup
customer_reviews.text: I use these to light video backgrounds while using a more expensive Apurture unit to light my subject. Nice product. Stands are surprisingly robust.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.text: Just get them! They’re super cheap, but amazing quality! I use them many times throughout the week and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Lights arrived quickly, and were put to use on a shoot quickly. Very happy with them. Wish Neewer sold barn door attachments as a separate purchase...I see they have light & barndoor packages, but no barn door attachments sold separately. Perhaps they'll rectify that.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Hartel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for me
customer_reviews.text: Great, clear, vivid images! Very bright subjects & shadow free. Amazing difference these lights has done to my pics.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle/Bisugo

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to video single person testimonials. I first used two lights, one on either side, but it cast shadows...duh. Now I use one straight on, except on larger group shots, then I use two. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chayer

customer_reviews.title: These suckas are bright
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, definitely right on time for our production, looking forward to using them on our location shoot in a few weeks...
customer_reviews.author: John Dennis

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT lights at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe the quality of these lights for the price. My buddy laughed at me when I told him I found a good pair of panel lights for under $200, but guess who's laughing now? These bad boys are BRIGHT and the lighting consistent. The best part is that they're dimmable and you can easily switch between the white and yellow lighting with the twist of a knob. You almost dont even need to use the diffusers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright, but the panels are too small and create harsh shadows. I was going to return them, but it turns out they make great work lights, so I kept them for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: to really nice even light for my YouTube videos
customer_reviews.text: I went from half my face in the dark, due to using a sunny window, to really nice even light for my YouTube videos. This was just what I needed. Not too big, not too heavy, easy to use, and no assembly. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Alison L.

customer_reviews.title: Super slim and good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price you just can't beat this. Not even 2 inches thick, these lights are super slim! The flat panel design makes them super stylish and professional looking as well as functional. The bi colored led lights stand on a U bracket and can be turned and fixed to position up or down. They shine beautifully and can be dimmed. Powered by an ac adapter it makes it the perfect studio lighting. Cord is a good length for out extensions. The included stands are good quality as well and work as a great support system.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: These have a crazy range of lighting options between the 2 dials. If you can't find the lighting you are looking for with these, you might have other issues. lol These work great.
customer_reviews.author: The Sweet Karma Bar

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Facebook live videos and they work well in small dark rooms or large rooms. Love them . Super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are smaller than I expected but there is a cool feature in that you can adjust the yellow lights ...
customer_reviews.text: squares are smaller than I expected but there is a cool feature in that you can adjust the yellow lights with the white lights. Only problem with that is that there isn't a wide enough gradient to adjust the exact amount of light
customer_reviews.author: Reem Usif

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for small podcast studio
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. All the lights work and brightness is adjustable. Perfect for my podcast studio. Also, I used them to start some tomato and pepper plants in February. Worked fine for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Aune

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: I have two sets of these now. Professional looking Zoom calls!
customer_reviews.author: Acags

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: A led light plus a light stand is definitely worth the price, not two packs. It looks very craftsmanship, the led lights are arranged quite compactly, and the silver border is sooo advanced. The light stand is definitely a big show, then I am going to buy batteries for them, although I can use the adapter in the studio, but I look forward to bringing them out with the included bags in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights to light my green screen. They're much sturdier than the softbox lights I got to light my subjects. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Monterey

customer_reviews.title: They are professional!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size is easy to carry, even if we don't use the bags in this kit, the ordinary shoulder bag can hold these led panels. The stands are adjustable and taller than me (I am 180cm). I use it to shoot portraits for my family, and my sister likes to take self-portraits with these LED lights. They can be adjusted to different brightness and color temperature according to our needs! Although I use them at home, this does not affect their professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for what its worth. Two of them will light a big living room for a good shot. What i dont like is the side knobs. When tilting the light one tights up and the other loosens. Had to add washers to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lights, broken bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These are cool, very bright and nice looking, however a few of the bulbs came burnt out and the batteries didn’t last very long. Good lights, expensive considering the busted bulbs and such but the lights themselves are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these regularly for about two months now for YouTube videos and I’m so pleased with them. They are an excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super great deal for this set including two packs of panel lights as well as light stands. They provide my small room with more than plenty of light. The lighting it can achieve is so unique and unlike any other panel I've had before. Completely portable too and each comes with a carrying bag to keep the panel in so it's easy to take with me and use for outdoor shoots where I change my shot multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Use these for studio photography and video.
customer_reviews.author: April Lynne Gayler

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite brands when it comes to photography equipment, as always I am quite satisfied with these lights. The installation is simple just takes place in seconds and the whole set is robust and solidly made. The panels are compact yet bright enough. With the great dimmer function they can always light up the room and products for shooting properly. Totally top notch! I can only recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: wide range of intensity to choose with the dummer and even more better options since they're dual colored. whether I want soft or warm lighting these panels have got me covered. they make for a great portable, twin set and the diffusors I get soft lighting without having to put together those huge boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and worth it. Good for youtube videos
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I have professional-looking lighting equipment for my photography business. Will add pics later
customer_reviews.author: Cryst4lfemme

customer_reviews.title: Good product but the diguser shield doesn't difuse as well as I would prefer.
customer_reviews.text: These are good lights at a great price but the diffuser plastic sheet doesn't difuse as well as a true difusser screen. But they are compact, light weight and seem durable enough for the nature of the product. If I was buying these again I would buy some kind of screen dofuser to place in front of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Used for a home studio
customer_reviews.text: Bright. Very bright. Temperature control is excellent too. Tripods are stable. Nothing to complain about, it performs as advertised (in my case to light a green screen).
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Puffet

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: WISH THERE WAS A LITTLE MORE OUTPUT, BUT IT'S GREAT OTHERWISE.
customer_reviews.author: raphael dubois

product_meta.title: Neewer 2 Packs Dimmable Bi-Color 480 LED Video Light and Stand Lighting Kit Includes: 3200-5600K CRI 96+ LED Panel with U Bracket, 75 inches Light Stand for YouTube Studio Photography, Video Shooting
product_meta.description:
Note: Battery is NOT Included

Descriptions:

Bi-color LED Video Light:

With its lightweight and durable construction, you can carry this light around with you wherever you go.

Features with color temperature knob, can adjust the color temperature from 3200K to 5600K.

White diffuser can make soften the light source and enhance skin tone in portraits photography.

Adjustable U mount bracket makes the light toward different angle for the best shooting.

P

Specification:

LED Beads:480 Pieces

Voltage: DC 12V

Power:29W

Color Temperature:3200-5600K

Lumen:3360Lux/m

CRI:≥96

Power Source: Power Adapter or Sony NP-F550 NP-F970 Li-ion Battery (Battery NOT Included)

Battery Output: DC 14.8V

Input Voltage: 110-130V

Light Stand:

This adjustable light stand is constructed from aluminum alloy, giving it exceptional strength for heavy duty work.

Solid locking capabilities ensure the safety of your lighting equipment when in use.

Compliant with industry standards, this stand supports all major photo equipment including reflectors, softboxes, lights, umbrellas, backgrounds and more.

Specification:

Folded height: 25.98 inches/ 2.16 feet

Maximum height: 75 inches / 6.23 feet

Net weight per light stand: 3 pounds / 1.36 kilograms

Max. Load capacity: 13.5 pounds / 6.12 kilograms

Spigot: 1/4 or 3/8

Segments: 3

Package Contents:

2 x Bi-color LED Video Light

2 x White Diffuser

2 x Power Adapter

2 x Power Cable

2 x Carrying Case

2 x Light Stand
feature_bullets: Note: Dimensions of LED Light: 10x10.4x1.9 inches/26x26.5x5 centimeters

Kit Includes: (2)Bi-color LED Video Light with U Bracket, (2)White Diffuser, (2)Power Adapter, (2)Power Cable, (2)Carrying Case (2) 26inches/66centimeters-75inches/190centimeters Adjustable Light Stand;Note: Battery is NOT Included

Dimmable Bi-color LED Light: With 240 White and 240 Yellow LED long lasting bulbs, illuminates a variable white balance from tungsten-daylight 3200-5600K Color Temperature; U-mount Bracket enables the photographers to adjust the lighting angle according to the shooting environment

Durable Material: Made of excellent quality aluminum alloy showing simple elegant appearance; Can be placed directly on the light stand, ground or desk; Provides multiple shooting solutions for your creation work
Useful Accessories: Comes with a white diffuser to soften the harsh light; A carrying bag makes it convenient to carry and store the light and other accessories.Lumen:3360Lux/m

Adjustable Light Stand: Made of aluminum alloy, giving it exceptional strength for heavy duty work;Height ranges from 26 inches/66 centimeters to 75 inches/190 centimeters; Solid locking capabilities ensure the safety of your lighting equipment when in use
